alert.note: Alert for Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:32AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Grady, Thomas and western Brooks Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1132 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Cairo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Quitman, Thomasville, Cairo, Boston, Pavo, Barwick, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Grooverville, Dillon, Everett, Rocky Hill, Princes Still, Brooks Co A/p, Nickleville, Dixie, Moncrief, Patten, Eason, Oaklawn and Pidcock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida...and south central and southwestern Georgia.
